sn23.10:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam radham bhagava etadavoca:
sn23.10:1.3: “rupe kho, radha, yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.4: Evam tam rupam pahinam bhavissati ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
sn23.10:1.5: Vedanaya yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.6: Evam sa vedana pahina bhavissati ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn23.10:1.8: sankharesu yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.9: Evam te sankhara pahina bhavissanti ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn23.10:1.10: Vinnane yo chando yo rago ya nandi ya tanha ye upayupadana cetaso adhitthanabhinivesanusaya, te pajahatha.
sn23.10:1.11: Evam tam vinnanam pahinam bhavissati ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhamman”ti.
